name: Aspirin
description: Aspirin is used to reduce pain, fever, or inflammation.
usage: Take as directed by your physician. Do not exceed the recommended dosage.

name: Ibuprofen
description: Ibuprofen is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) that reduces fever and relieves pain.
usage: Take with food to minimize stomach upset. Follow the dosage instructions on the label.

name: Paracetamol
description: Paracetamol is used to treat mild to moderate pain and to reduce fever.
usage: Do not exceed 4 grams in 24 hours. Consult a doctor if pain persists.

name: Amoxicillin
description: Amoxicillin is an antibiotic used to treat a variety of bacterial infections.
usage: Complete the full course as prescribed, even if symptoms improve.

name: Metformin
description: Metformin is used to improve blood sugar control in adults and children with type 2 diabetes.
usage: Take with meals to reduce gastrointestinal side effects.
